tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Dr Rajesh meticulously examines the issue and ensures we are made aware of the process and need for the procedure! He takes things slow and does not end up recommending a root canal immediately. Saving a tooth when he has to and making the best ceramic caps post procedure that looks as good as a real tooth. I highly recommend him!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: First and foremost, The doctor is very cordial and in the first sitting explained to me the condition and course of treatment that needs to meted out.  Throughout the treatment the doctor made me feel comfortable and never ever I felt any pain during the treatment. Highly recommended....

Doctor Shah takes utmost care of the patient. Before I came to him I was worried about my tooth and the pain I may have to undergo. But today when the treatment is over I am going smiling and there is no pain at all. He is highly experienced and meticulous. Thanks a  lot Sir.

Doctor has a lot of experience and is a very senior practioner. He explained everything to me with lot of patience and answered all my queries. He made sure I was comfortable during my treatment and that I had a pain free experience. ** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** *** Would surely visit him again.

The doctor is very polite and has a systematic approach towards making patients understand their problem. Though I was very scared of visiting a dentist initially, he made sure I was comfortable during my treatment. He is very experienced, and that made me even more comfortable. I would definitely visit him again for any other dental problems in future.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Friendly and professional services with a very humane approach. Prompt with the appointment times and follow up visits.

I received top quality treatment in a state-of-the-art dental facility with personalized dental attention. Thanks to the skillful and extremely professional  dentists at Smile plus dental clinic.
I highly recommend this clinic.

Without taking the consent of patient, the doctor took X-ray. Also, he didn't inform about the cost of x-ray (₹. 900). The consultation fee also charged excess (₹. 300 actually paid Vs ₹. 200 as per practo).

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
context: Treatment for bleeding/ Swolen Gums,Teeth Whitening,
review: I have been having  Gum bleeding and swelling for more than 6 months, i underwent gum curettage treatment with Dr Shah and i have got immediate relief from the issues.
Dr Rajendra Shah explained the entire teeth aesthetic process in detailed manner and carried out the procedure with precision.

I am a regular patient of Dr. Shah and I have always been impressed with his diagnostic skills.. He has experience of over 35 years and is very polite. He always answers all my queries and offers best treatments at reasonable prices.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: My overall experience was good.  I would highly recommend Dr Rajendra shah for treatment  dental problems!!!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: The doctor is quite friendly, understands the time constraints all of us face and most importantly - builds trust as an advisor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor clearly articulated problem. Extremely satisfied with the treatment and quick recovery of my gums.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I am very happy with the doctor, his treatment, friendliness, explanation of procedure, cost and the efficiency of time, in seven days the doctor fixed 7 teeth of mine with 5 root canals.

Thank you Dr. Rajendra Shah, you are a part of family now.
reply_text: Thank you for your appreciation. At Smile plus dental clinic, we use the latest and best technologies in dentistry to give good quality treatment results to our patients. Patient satisfaction  is what keeps us going.

review:
Satisfied wid the tooth treatment and the doctor explained abt the tooth issue.
Will recommend others if any
reply_text: Thanks a lot for ur feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Dr. Shah explained everything in the beginning and executed the same effectively. He made it all very painless and effective.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Very nice and efficient doctor. Good explanation and good at building trust by showing the results every time. Thank you !
It was really good. Doctor Sir was very caring and listened to my problems. Gave very good solutions and administered the treatment very efficiently. Very cost effective.
The treatment was very smooth and Dr Shah was very nice and helpful in diagnosing the problem areas and recommending solutions.... Would highly recommend the clinic
I did my full mouth treatment Dr.is very good & explained me all procedures in detail.all treatment was painless &rates are very reasonable I will recommend to my friends & family members
Patient doctor. Meticulous and confident about his work and consultation. I hope I don't find any issues with the dental treatment I have got done from here
Very professional; hygienic and organised.Highly recommend for dental treatments.Paediatric dentistry also good
********* ********* **** highly experienced doctor !  Our entire family is taking treatment since last three to four years !Thanks
I have been regular here since last four years and Dr Shah has done extremely good job of restoring all my teeth in good condition, thank you so much!

Very experienced hands. Did the filling work without hassles and painlessly.
 Will come again only to this doctor  !!:)
The surgery was less painful which was nice. It was started on time and took around 40 mins. We can refer to family and friends.

It was good ..Dr Shahis a experienced doctor ..treatment went well , I had a pain in my tooth whichwas recently treated by some other dentist ....he could rectify the problem .
Will do recommend to family n friends
Excellent... I was very scared..people made me scared that wisdom tooth is painful.. But it wasn't ..wow experience...
Very good ... and very nicely treatment was done satisfied with the overall process and systematically was done with no delay in work liked the experienced..! :)
